A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I don’t know what these people are talking about giving it low scores. I’ll admit I’m a huge Star Wars fan\, but I went with a group of 7 people not all of which were big Star Wars fans like myself\, and everyone loved it. Yes\, there are a few quirky moments\, but certainly no worse than any of the original episodes had. Blows the prequels out of the water so don’t listen to these people rating it poorly. See it with an open mind and you’ll enjoy it.
